ED_Title: Question of the Comorian island of Mayotte
ED_DecisionText: At its 102nd plenary meeting, on 9 September 2021, the General Assembly decided to include the item entitled “Question of the Comorian island of Mayotte” in the draft agenda of its seventy-sixth session.
ED_Disclaimer: The final text of this decision will be contained in document A/75/49 (Vol. III) after editorial review.
